textvalue.text: Wins are awarded on left to right adjacent symbols regardless of size. Payouts are multiplied by Stake.
MATCHING SYMBOLS PAY FROM LEFT TO RIGHT REGARDLESS OF HEIGHT
Select your stake by clicking the left and right arrow buttons on the stake. The stake value is displayed in the stake display.
All payouts are multiplied by the stake of each individual spin.
Press the Play button to start the spin at the stake displayed.
The reels will spin and then come to stop, displaying the result.

To set up Auto play press the Auto button. This will display Auto play panel which the player can use to modify the number of spins, set a loss limit or set a win limit. When a loss limit has been set the player can select Start to commence auto play.

When Auto play is on, the Play button will change to a Stop button. The remaining Auto plays will be displayed in the Stop button. The player can cancel Auto play by clicking the Stop button. Auto play will stop automatically if any of the limits set is reached or anything occurs that requires player intervention.
Auto play may not be available in your jurisdiction.
All involved combinations are multiplied by 1 unless otherwise shown on the symbol
The stake that was used to trigger the Free Spins will be used for the Free Spins duration.
At the end of the Free Spins, the total winnings for the spins will be displayed. Any winnings will be credited into the players account and regular play then resumes.
Highest win paid per winning combination. All winning combinations are added together. See PAYS for further information.
The game has an RTP of @@RTP-PARTA.@@RTP-PARTB%.
In the event of a non-responsive game or problem during a spin, the game will repeat the incomplete spin and display the result to the player when the game is next launched.
Incomplete games will become void after 90 days and will be forfeited to charity.
Incomplete games will be automatically resolved after 2 days. Any winnings resulting from automatic resolve shall be paid to player's account.

In the event of an interruption during the presentation of a result (for example, due loss of connectivity), the correct value of any winnings for that result will be credited to the player's account.
System malfunction voids all pays and plays.
The following game features and settings may be subject to the terms and conditions of the gaming site. For more information on the following, refer to the gaming website:
• The procedures used to manage unfinished game rounds.
• The time after which inactive game sessions automatically end.
The average payout per 1 Euro spent is @@AVERAGERTP-PARTA.@@AVERAGERTP-PARTB cents.
The probability of the max prize is 0.01844%
Press GAMBLE for the opportunity to go DOUBLE OR NOTHING up to 5 times with every win.
Every win will enable the GAMBLE button.
In some cases the Gamble Feature may be disabled.
Gamble Feature is disabled during Auto play.
Select events that will cancel your Auto play session. You can stop Auto play at any time by pressing the Stop button.
If multiple options are chosen any limit reached will stop the Auto play session.
Auto play has stopped due to:
Not enough balance for the bet. Adjust bet or add funds to continue play.
Error trying to save the state
Error trying to start the game
Error trying to end the game
Game isn't supported by the system
You have been disconnected from the Server. Please restart the game.
A technical error has occurred. If it persists please contact customer support.
A technical error has occurred. Please try again.
Congratulations! You have %d Free Spins. Play Free Spins Now?
Congratulations! You have %d Free Spins. Good Luck!
Congratulations! You have won %c in Free Spins. Free Spins has now ended. Funds will now be used from your account. Your bet amount will now be reset back to the default.
Free Spins has now ended. Funds will now be used from your account. Your bet amount will now be reset back to the default.
You were awarded Free Spins, but an error has occurred.
Press Start to trigger free spins at the price displayed. Your current stake will apply to each free spin.
FEATURE PRICE IS REDUCED WITH EACH COIN
Feature Drop allows you to buy the feature.
The feature may be bought for the price displayed in the Feature Drop button. If the price is reduced to a zero balance the feature will automatically trigger.
Feature Drop symbols appear in the reels and reduce the price of the feature purchase by these amounts.
The price reduced is multiplied by the stake.
In some jurisdictions, the feature cannot be bought if the price is above a purchase price limit or if feature buy is disabled.
An error occurred. Unable to buy feature.
When the price is reduced to zero the feature will automatically trigger.
You have %d Free Spins. Good Luck!
You have %d Free Spins. Play Free Spins Now?
Free Spins Awarded. Please choose your option:
Are you sure you want to discard the offer now?
There are no more offers available
All winnings from those Free Games that were completed have already been added to your balance.
FREE GAMES SESSION ID %d-%d HAS EXPIRED
Your session has expired. Close and reopen the game to continue.
Session moved to another browser. Close and reopen the game if you wish to continue playing here.
Technical problem. Your account has not been charged, please try again later.
You are currently blocked from playing.
Not enough tokens for chosen betsize (533).
Login attempt comes from blocked region (534).
Player has active session at same game at another server (540).
There is not enough money on your cash or Voucher balance. Try to lower your bet size or deposit to play.
Blocked from playing - daily time limit exceeded.
Blocked from playing - weekly time limit exceeded.
Blocked from playing - monthly time limit exceeded.
An error occurred (600). Please try again later.
In some jurisdictions and casinos, an award cap might be in place.
This casino or jurisdiction has an award cap of %s.
The total win for any bet cannot be higher than the award cap.
If the award cap is reached during a feature then the feature ends immediately.
To find out if an award cap is in place, check the in-game Help and the casino's terms and conditions.
YOU HAVE WON THE MAXIMUM AWARD!
GAMBLE TO WIN UP TO 24 FREE SPINS
GAMBLE MAY RESULT IN LOSS OF FREE SPINS
THE WIN MULTIPLIER BEGINS AT ONE AND INCREASES AFTER EVERY REACTION
3 OR MORE SCATTERS WINS EXTRA FREE SPINS!
Wins begin with leftmost reel and pay left to right on consecutive reels. Payouts are multiplied by stake.
Win multiplier starts at one and increases after every reaction.
The Free Spin Scatter can appear in the extra reel during Free Spins. 3 = four extra Free Spins. 4 = eight extra Free Spins.
Each reel alone or with the extra reel can have up to 7 symbols. Each spin can have up to
Get three "HOT" Scatters to win 8 Free Spins.
Wilds substitute all symbols except Scatters and Feature Drop symbols.
Every extra Scatter adds an extra four Free Spins.

After triggering the Feature, the Free Spins Gamble Wheel is displayed, giving you the chance to win up to 24 Free Spins. You can choose to COLLECT or GAMBLE.
Press COLLECT to start the Free Spins with the current number of Free Spins awarded.
Press GAMBLE to spin the wheel. A successful gamble will award four extra Free Spins, as well as the opportunity to play another Free Spins Gamble. An unsuccessful gamble awards the number of Free Spins displayed in black. If the number in black is zero the feature ends.
The extra reel adds a symbol to the reel it is below for reels 2,3,4 and 5.
Extra Chilli is a six-reel video slot with reacting wins featuring Big Time Gaming’s unique Megaways™

A Megaways™ slot can produce up to 7 symbols per reel each spin. The extra reel adds a symbol to reels 2,3,4 and 5, Each spin can have from 2 and 7 symbols and each spin can have up to 117649 MEGAWAYS™ to win.
All winning symbols except Scatters are part of a reaction and are replaced by symbols coming from above on the reels and from the right in the extra reel.
Wilds are only present in the extra reel.
Get three "HOT" Scatters in any position in the base game to win eight Free Spins. Any extra Scatter adds an extra four Free Spins.
Scatter symbols can appear in any of the reels in the base game except the extra reel.
During Free Spins there is an unlimited win multiplier which starts at 1 and is increased by 1 after each reaction.
Free Spin Scatter symbols can appear in the extra reel and award extra Free Spins. The stake that was used to trigger the Free Spins will be used for the Free Spins duration.
At the end of the Free Spins, the total winnings for the spins will be displayed. Any winnings will be credited into the players account and regular play then resumes.
The Free Spin Scatter symbol can appear only in the extra reel during Free Spins.
3 Free Spin Scatters in any position award 4 extra Free Spins. 4 Free Spin Scatters award 8 extra Free Spins.
Feature Drop allows you to buy the feature for the price displayed in the Feature Drop button.
Feature Drop symbols may appear in any position in the reels to reduce the price of the feature purchase. Feature Drop symbols do not appear in the extra reel or during a feature.
If the price is reduced to a zero balance the feature will automatically trigger.
A win is matching consecutive symbols, regardless of height, from left to right starting from left most reel.
The game without buying Feature Drop has an RTP of 96.15% - 96.41%.
The game when buying Feature Drop has an RTP of between 96.26% - 96.82%.
In all cases, the optimal strategy is to always spin the Feature Gamble Wheel.
The average payout per 1 Euro spent is 96 cents.
